citation.title: Methyltransferase domain of human bicoid-interacting protein 3 homolog (drosophila).

reference.scope: X-RAY CRYSTALLOGRAPHY (2.65 ANGSTROMS) OF 400-689 IN COMPLEX WITH SUBSTRATE

comment.text: S-adenosyl-L-methionine-dependent methyltransferase that adds a methylphosphate cap at the 5'-end of 7SK snRNA, leading to stabilize it.

Component of the 7SK snRNP complex at least composed of P-TEFb (composed of CDK9 and CCNT1/cyclin-T1), HEXIM1, HEXIM2, MEPCE/BCDIN3, SART3 proteins and 7SK and U6 snRNAs (PubMed:17643375, Ref.24). Interacts with METTL16 (PubMed:29051200). Interacts with RBM7; upon genotoxic stress this interaction is enhanced, triggering the release of inactive P-TEFb complex from the core, yielding to P-TEFb complex activation (PubMed:30824372).
Expressed in chronic myeloid leukemia cells, adrenal gland, brain, cerebellum, kidney, lung, mammary gland and testis. Weakly or not expressed in other tissues.

property.value: Expressed in right testis and 228 other tissues
P:negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
P:positive regulation of G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle

feature.description: Glycyl lysine isopeptide (Lys-Gly) (interchain with G-Cter in SUMO2)
